MBA.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a university degree in the skills needed to be in charge of a business that you can get after your first degree. A person who has this degree is also called an MBA
MBA.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Rick is a 32-year-old MBA from Harvard.
MBA.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: Master of Business Administration; a university degree that teaches you the skills you need to manage a business or part of a business
MBA.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Smith received an MBA from the Harvard Business School.
